message.original: 破攻の証 プリースト戦術試練
戦闘の基本を学ぶため 修練の祠にて試練に挑む
message.translation: In order to learn the fundamentals of combat, challenge the trial of the Training Chapel

message.original: 修練の祠内のウィルソンと話す
message.translation: Speak with Wilson in Training Chapel

message.original: 敵にしがみつきライドセイントオーラを成功させよ
message.translation: Cling to the enemy and successfully use Ride Holy Aura

message.original: 敵にしがみつきライドヒールオーラを成功させよ
message.translation: Cling to the enemy and successfully use Ride Heal Aura

message.original: しがみつき中に敵の振りほどき（黄）から耐えろ
message.translation: Use Resist to endure the enemy's swing (yellow icon) while climbing them

message.original: しがみつき中に敵の引きはがし（赤）から離脱せよ
message.translation: While climbing the enemy, jump off during their knock-away attack (red icon)

message.original: 攻撃して敵を怒らせよ
ヒールオーラで怒る敵のシークレットコアを発見せよ
message.translation: Reveal the enemy's secret core during their enraged state with Heal Aura

message.original: 怒った敵を揺さぶって疲れさせろ
message.translation: Shake the enemy while they are enraged and tire them

message.original: 最奥にある＜破攻の証＞を入手する
message.translation: Collect the proof of completing the trial

message.original: 白竜神殿のレンテンに経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
